text: "When she came on … it was just the greatest," James said. "Fans loved it, everybody on the crew loved it. We just knew right away, so we thought, 'How can we get her here full-time to be on the show?'"
title: Kevin James explains why he killed off ‘Kevin Can Wait’ wife and brought on former TV wife Leah Remini

meta_data.description: Kevin James says the decision was not a reflection of Erinn Hayes' talent or a chemistry issue.
